attributes.action: Make all types of animal hunting for sport a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details:
Hundreds of thousands of animals across the world are killed needlessly every year for "sport", this petition may not be able to change the world but if it could just do something here then maybe we can lead the way for other nations.

The below link to a video on YouTube is what inspired me to do this, some people may find it distressing. 

http://youtu.be/6fIpVnSR-qE
attributes.background: I see more and more poor defenceless animals killed needlessly all the time mostly on social media, there is absolutely no justifiable reason to killing animals as a sport, just so cowards can feel good about them selves when they kill an animal from sometimes 100s of metres away.
